name: Ch18BBaseConvo3
_source: speak;Knoll;Hmm...|The lava's flow here is particularly strong...|The ancient texts speak of drawing power from such places.
speak;Knoll;If I can just observe the pattern of the currents...
speak;Knoll;...|I feel as though I'm being watched...
speak;Lute;Subject continues to examine volcanic activity.|Hypothesis: attempting forbidden magical experimentation.
speak;Knoll;Gah!|How long have you been standing there?
speak;Lute;Precisely fourteen minutes and thirty-seven seconds.|I've been documenting your behavior.
speak;Knoll;Lute...|This is the third time I've caught you... observing me.
speak;Lute;Fourth, actually.|You failed to notice me yesterday by the river.
speak;Lute;What exactly are you attempting with the volcano?|Some type of Gradonian dark magic, I presume?
speak;Knoll;I'm simply conducting research.|There's nothing sinister about it.
speak;Lute;My superior intellect tells me otherwise.|You've been measuring the lava patterns and consulting that tome for days.
speak;Lute;You're clearly attempting to harness volcanic energy.
speak;Knoll;I've been studying an ancient technique to imbue magical tomes with elemental properties.
speak;Knoll;This volcano has unique qualities that could enhance fire magic.
speak;Lute;Imbuing tomes with elemental properties?|That's...|That's actually quite innovative.
speak;Lute;Wait a moment!|Are you attempting to create a spell that would surpass my magical genius?
speak;Knoll;I'm merely trying to preserve some knowledge from Grado's libraries before it's lost forever.
speak;Lute;Hmm.|A likely story.|My intellect is superior to all others in the army, you know.
speak;Knoll;I... have no doubt of your abilities, Miss Lute.|I've heard tales of your prodigious talents.
speak;Knoll;In fact, perhaps you would be interested in this research?|The tome itself could benefit from a fresh perspective.
speak;Lute;You would share your findings with me?|Even after I've been monitoring you?
speak;Knoll;Knowledge should be preserved and shared.|That's what Prince Lyon always believed...
speak;Knoll;Here.|I've made notes on the margins.
speak;Knoll;Yes.|I think you may understand it better than I do.|The volcanic energies seem to respond better to anima magic than dark magic.
speak;Lute;Well...|I suppose if anyone can perfect this technique, it would be me.
speak;Lute;There are indeed no better hands for a tome with the power of a volcano.|My genius will ensure its completion.
speak;Knoll;I have no doubt.|Perhaps you could share what you discover?|For academic purposes, of course.
speak;Lute;I shall document my process with exacting precision.|You may review my notes when I've finished.
speak;Lute;Though I doubt you'll comprehend the full depth of my magical theory.
speak;Lute;But I'll simplify it for you, as a courtesy.
speak;Lute;Now, if you'll excuse me.|I must begin my analysis immediately.
speak;Lute;This volcanic power will be a worthy addition to my unparalleled magical arsenal.
speak;Knoll;What an... unusual person.|Though I must admit, her confidence is rather impressive.
speak;Knoll;Perhaps giving her that tome was the wisest decision.|At least now she might stop following me...
